video.resources: There are no resources in this course.
video.transcript:
Coach:

Ask the following questions:
• Were the targets fulfilled? This will mean looking at the Business MIS and analyzing how well the life insurance professional performed.
• Did the life insurance professional meet or exceed the targets? If not, why not?
• Were there any circumstances that could have affected performance?

Understanding how well the life insurance professional performed in the past and why, will give you a good starting point for a discussion on setting and agreeing on targets.
